name: hellobd-load-test
description: Load testing suite for hellobd.news using Artillery

scripts.test:smoke: artillery run --target https://hellobd.news load-test.yml --environment smoke --output report.json
scripts.test:load: artillery run --target https://hellobd.news load-test.yml --environment load --output report.json
scripts.test:pure: artillery run --target https://hellobd.news load-test.yml --environment pure --output report.json
scripts.test:stress: artillery run --target https://hellobd.news load-test.yml --environment stress --output report.json
scripts.full-extreme-test: npm run test:extreme && npm run report
